review: Love my Fire TV Sticks - yes, sticks . . . I got two of them.  One for the bedroom and one for the living room.  Love them!  Cable has a million stations and some days, nothing to watch.  But there is *always* something to watch on my Amazon Fire TV Stick.  I would absolutely recommend it to anyone looking to expand their viewing options. As always, Amazon delivered on time and in good order.  If you're thinking of getting one - just do it.
author: Angela Sternreich

review: The connection drops constantly. It redirect to the network connection screen every few minutes and shows a strong signal then drops again as soon as you try to view anything. Doesn't work with Xfinity X1 system. According to Amazon Customer Service this is a known issue. Their advice was to downgrade my X1 router by disabling IPv6. All my computers rely in IPv6 for the strongest download speeds so NO I will not downgrade my router settings. Since the fire stick only works using the older IPv4 technology it's useless to me. I spent three weeks with customer support trying to get to the problem and now they tell me it's too late to return it after 4 weeks. WTF. In to the trash it goes. Don't waste your money.
author: J. Bostick "gadget lover"
